data.title: LATE: Staged Reading of a New Musical by Kathleen Cahill and Michael Wartofsky
data.meta_description: LATE is an inspirational new musical that reunites a group of teenagers one year after a school shooting. With book and lyrics by Kathleen Cahill and music by Michael Wartofsky, this reading of a musical-in-progress will be followed by a moderated audience discussion, as well an opportunity to provide feedback online. Come be a part of our development process!
data.text: LATE is an inspirational new musical that reunites a group of teenagers one year after a school shooting. With book and lyrics by Kathleen Cahill and music by Michael Wartofsky, this reading of a musical-in-progress will be followed by a moderated audience discussion, as well an opportunity to provide feedback online. Come be a part of our development process!
